frame.name: Prevent_from_having
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Preventing_cause</fen> keeps a <fen>Protagonist</fen> from having a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> that they need or desire.
<ex><fex name="Agent">His parents</fex> <t>deprived</t> <fex name="Protagonist">him</fex> <fex name="State_of_affairs">of food</fex> <fex name="Duration">for days on end</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Preventing_cause">Our lonely city</fex> <t>starves</t> <fex name="Protagonist">us</fex> <fex name="State_of_affairs">of original live music</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">Employees</fex> were <t>denied</t> <fex name="State_of_affairs">overtime pay and meal breaks</fex>. <fex name="Agent">CNI</fex> </ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Preventing_cause
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Preventing_cause</fen> is the agent or force which keeps the <fen>Event</fen> from happening.
<ex><fex name="Preventing_cause">Israeli law</fex> effectively <t>deprived</t> <fex name="Protagonist">the owners</fex> <fex name="State_of_affairs">of their homes and lands</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: State_of_affairs
FE.definition:
<def-root>The is the situation, state-of-affairs, or state of having a possession that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is kept from having.
<ex>Their parents <t>denied</t> them <fex name="State_of_affairs">a brand new car</fex> upon their sweet 16.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> is when the <fen>Preventing_cause</fen> keeps the <fen>Event</fen> from taking place.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> is where the <fen>Preventing_cause</fen> keeps the <fen>Event</fen> from taking place.</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person who keeps the <fen>Event</fen> from happening.
<ex><fex name="Agent">The uncaring King Frank</fex> often <t>starves</t> his citizens of tax relief.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is the person who is kept from having the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The reason why the <fen>Agent</fen> keeps the <fen>Protagonist</fen> from having the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.
<ex>I have suggested <t>depriving</t> children of TV-viewing time <fex name="Purpose">as a sanction</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of time for which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is denied the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>How it is possible that the deprivation event occurs.
<ex><fex name="Explanation">By acting as his own agent</fex>, Joe <t>deprived</t> himself of this valuable information.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE marks the frequency with which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is prevented from having the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition: <def-root>An event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at the time of prevention and which the prevention is taken to be a part of.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: starve.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: render someone totally without a desired possession or state-of-affairs.

lexUnit.name: deny.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: not allow to have something
